data.name: Pixel Game Maker MV - STAR CAPTOR - Isometric Shooter Sample Project
data.detailed_description:
This sample game is a simple quarter-view scrolling shooter. You can use the objects as a reference.
You are also free to use any materials in the project.

Your ship can catch enemies and bullets fired by enemies, and throw them after catching them.
Depending on the type of object you catch, the bullets you throw will change.
When your health reaches 0, you have to start over from the beginning of the stage.
Your score and stamina are displayed on the screen.

●Controls (XInput compatible controller)

  • Up, Down, Left, Right: Move.
  • A: Catch enemies and bullets, slow down after catching.

●Bonus

The following materials are included as freebies.
Please use them for your game creation.
  • Music (10 songs)
  • 8bit style font with good visibility.

●Stored Area

Select "Sample" to display the sample project.
If it is not displayed, please try uninstalling and reinstalling.

data.short_description: This is the DLC for the Pixel Game Maker MV-made Isometric Shooter Sample Project. This will help you to understand the basics of how it works. All included materials may be used freely.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WindowsR 8/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WindowsR 8/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 3.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU / NVIDIA GeForce GTX750 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
